member.name: REGISTERWORDA
member.summary: Contains reading information or a word to register.

member.name: REGISTERWORDA.lpReading
member.summary: Pointer to the reading information for the word to register. If the reading information is not needed, the member can be set to NULL.

member.name: REGISTERWORDA.lpWord
member.summary: Pointer to the word to register. If a word is not needed, the member can be set to NULL.

member.name: REGISTERWORDA
member.summary: Contains reading information or a word to register.

member.name: REGISTERWORDA.lpReading
member.summary: Pointer to the reading information for the word to register. If the reading information is not needed, the member can be set to NULL.

member.name: REGISTERWORDA.lpWord
member.summary: Pointer to the word to register. If a word is not needed, the member can be set to NULL.
